name: Cyclone Wallet
description:
! IT'S A TESTNET VERSION !
Non-custodial Wallet of Cyclone Blockchain (Bitcoin Cryptography).

Tired of the complexities of Web3?
CYCL Wallet is seamlessly streamlines your interaction with Web3 assets.

Key Features:
Pay fees with any token: No more limitations! Utilize any token available on the Cyclone network to settle fees.
Fixed fees: Plan your expenses without surprises. Fees on Cyclone are always low and predictable.
Instant conversion: No need to wait! Swap tokens directly within the wallet with a single click.
Bitcoin Cryptography: Securely store your cryptocurrencies and NFTs without the need for third-party applications.
Transaction signing: Developers, rejoice! Create contract interaction scripts right from the wallet.

CYCL Wallet Extension is:
Convenient: Pay, swap, and store Cyclone network cryptocurrencies - all in one place.
Liberating: Use your tokens the way you want, without restrictions.
Embrace the future of Web3 with CYCL Wallet today!

CYCL Wallet: The future of Web3 is here.
